Description: Mitigation prevents a portion of Resolve loss and scales with your Armour
This scales with your Evasion Rating

Up to 50% of Resolve loss from Enemy Hits is removed from the Aegis before Resolve or Inspiration
Aegis is broken when any Resolve is lost from Enemy Hits
Aegis is instantly restored after 4 seconds of no Resolve being lost
Resolve Aegis scales with your maximum Energy Shield
